titleStmt.title: Three declarations first, the declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament vvith His Maiesties answer thereunto : secondly, a declaration and protestation agreed upon by the Grand Iury at the assizes held for the county of Worcester the third day of August, 1642 ... : thirdly the declaration of the Isle of Wight to the King and Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
